blocks.name: cnv
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of all normed complex vector spaces.
blocks.origin: const class cnv { NrmCVec }

blocks.name: diff.cnv.s
diff.cnv.c
diff.cnv.w
cpv
blocks.content: Extend class notation with vector addition in a normed complex vector space. In the literature, the subscript "v" is omitted, but we need it to avoid ambiguity with complex number addition ` + ` ~ caddc .
blocks.origin: const class cpv { +v }

blocks.name: diff.cpv.s
diff.cpv.c
diff.cpv.w
cba
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the base set of a normed complex vector space. (Note that ` BaseSet ` is capitalized because, once it is fixed for a particular vector space ` U ` , it is not a function, unlike e.g., ` normCV ` . This is our typical convention.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin: const class cba { BaseSet }

blocks.name: diff.cba.s
diff.cba.c
diff.cba.w
cns
blocks.content: Extend class notation with scalar multiplication in a normed complex vector space. In the literature scalar multiplication is usually indicated by juxtaposition, but we need an explicit symbol to prevent ambiguity.
blocks.origin: const class cns { .sOLD }

blocks.name: diff.cns.s
diff.cns.c
diff.cns.w
cn0v
blocks.content: Extend class notation with zero vector in a normed complex vector space.
blocks.origin: const class cn0v { 0vec }

blocks.name: diff.cn0v.s
diff.cn0v.c
diff.cn0v.w
cnsb
blocks.content: Extend class notation with vector subtraction in a normed complex vector space.
blocks.origin: const class cnsb { -v }

blocks.name: diff.cnsb.s
diff.cnsb.c
diff.cnsb.w
cnmcv
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the norm function in a normed complex vector space. In the literature, the norm of ` A ` is usually written "|| ` A ` ||", but we use function notation to take advantage of our existing theorems about functions.
blocks.origin: const class cnmcv { normCV }

blocks.name: diff.cnmcv.s
diff.cnmcv.c
diff.cnmcv.w
cims
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of the induced metrics on normed complex vector spaces.
blocks.origin: const class cims { IndMet }

diff.cims.w
df-nv
blocks.content: Define the class of all normed complex vector spaces. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-nv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cnv, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w3a(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cvc), wf(cv(s2), crn(cv(s0)), cr), wral(s3, crn(cv(s0)), w3a(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), nat0), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(cgi, cv(s0)))), wral(s4, cc, wceq(cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s4), cv(s1), cv(s3))), co(cfv(cabs, cv(s4)), cmul, cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3))))), wral(s4, crn(cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cv(s0), cv(s4))), cle, co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), caddc, cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-nv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ NrmCVec = { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |(< s0, s1 > ‚àà CVecOLD ‚àß(s2 : ran(s0)‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà ran(s0),(((s2 ` s3)= 0 ‚Üí s3 =(GId ` s0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(s2 `(s4[s1]s3))=((abs ` s4)[√ó](s2 ` s3)))‚àß ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà ran(s0),(s2 `(s3[s0]s4))[‚â§]((s2 ` s3)[+](s2 ` s4))))))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
}

blocks.name: nvss
blocks.content: Structure of the class of all normed complex vectors spaces. (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nvss() {
  |- wss(cnv, cxp(cvc, universe))
} = {
  3sstr4i(cnv, cxp(cvc, universe), copab(hs0, hs3, wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), w3a(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cvc), wf(cv(hs3), crn(cv(hs1)), cr), wral(hs4, crn(cv(hs1)), w3a(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs4), cfv(cgi, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs5, cc, wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs5), cv(hs2), cv(hs4))), co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs5)), cmul, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4))))), wral(hs5, crn(cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs4), cv(hs1), cv(hs5))), cle, co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs5)))))))))))), copab(hs0, hs3, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cvc), wcel(cv(hs3), universe))))
  ssopab2i(hs0, hs3, wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), w3a(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cvc), wf(cv(hs3), crn(cv(hs1)), cr), wral(hs4, crn(cv(hs1)), w3a(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs4), cfv(cgi, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs5, cc, wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs5), cv(hs2), cv(hs4))), co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs5)), cmul, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4))))), wral(hs5, crn(cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs4), cv(hs1), cv(hs5))), cle, co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs5))))))))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cvc), wcel(cv(hs3), universe)))
  jctir(wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), w3a(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cvc), wf(cv(hs3), crn(cv(hs1)), cr), wral(hs4, crn(cv(hs1)), w3a(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs4), cfv(cgi, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs5, cc, wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs5), cv(hs2), cv(hs4))), co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs5)), cmul, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4))))), wral(hs5, crn(cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs4), cv(hs1), cv(hs5))), cle, co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs5))))))))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cvc), wcel(cv(hs3), universe))
  exlimivv(hs1, hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), w3a(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cvc), wf(cv(hs3), crn(cv(hs1)), cr), wral(hs4, crn(cv(hs1)), w3a(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs4), cfv(cgi, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs5, cc, wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs5), cv(hs2), cv(hs4))), co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs5)), cmul, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4))))), wral(hs5, crn(cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs4), cv(hs1), cv(hs5))), cle, co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs5))))))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cvc))
  3ad2antr1(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cvc), wf(cv(hs3), crn(cv(hs1)), cr), wral(hs4, crn(cv(hs1)), w3a(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs4), cfv(cgi, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs5, cc, wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs5), cv(hs2), cv(hs4))), co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs5)), cmul, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4))))), wral(hs5, crn(cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs4), cv(hs1), cv(hs5))), cle, co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs5))))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cvc))
  biimpar(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cvc), wcel(cv(hs0), cvc))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cvc)
  vex(hs3)
  eqtri(cnv, copab(hs0, hs3, wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), w3a(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cvc), wf(cv(hs3), crn(cv(hs1)), cr), wral(hs4, crn(cv(hs1)), w3a(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs4), cfv(cgi, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs5, cc, wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs5), cv(hs2), cv(hs4))), co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs5)), cmul, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4))))), wral(hs5, crn(cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs4), cv(hs1), cv(hs5))), cle, co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs5)))))))))))), coprab(hs1, hs2, hs3, w3a(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cvc), wf(cv(hs3), crn(cv(hs1)), cr), wral(hs4, crn(cv(hs1)), w3a(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs4), cfv(cgi, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs5, cc, wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs5), cv(hs2), cv(hs4))), co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs5)), cmul, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4))))), wral(hs5, crn(cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs4), cv(hs1), cv(hs5))), cle, co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs5))))))))))
  df-nv(hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4, hs5)
  dfoprab2(hs1, hs2, hs3, hs0, w3a(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cvc), wf(cv(hs3), crn(cv(hs1)), cr), wral(hs4, crn(cv(hs1)), w3a(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs4), cfv(cgi, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs5, cc, wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs5), cv(hs2), cv(hs4))), co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs5)), cmul, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4))))), wral(hs5, crn(cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs4), cv(hs1), cv(hs5))), cle, co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs5)))))))))
  df-xp(hs0, hs3, cvc, universe)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cvc))
  diff.hs2.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cvc))
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs5)
  diff.hs4.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cvc), wf(cv(hs3), crn(cv(hs1)), cr), wral(hs4, crn(cv(hs1)), w3a(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs4), cfv(cgi, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs5, cc, wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs5), cv(hs2), cv(hs4))), co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs5)), cmul, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4))))), wral(hs5, crn(cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs4), cv(hs1), cv(hs5))), cle, co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs5)))))))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.c(cvc)
  diff.hs3.c(cvc)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs3.c(universe)
}

thm nvss() {
  ‚ä¢ NrmCVec ‚äÜ(CVecOLD √ó ùïå)
} = {
  3sstr4i(cnv, (CVecOLD √ó ùïå), { < hs0, hs3 > | ‚àÉ(hs1, ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ‚àß(< hs1, hs2 > ‚àà CVecOLD ‚àß(hs3 : ran(hs1)‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà ran(hs1),(((hs3 ` hs4)= 0 ‚Üí hs4 =(GId ` hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(hs3 `(hs5[hs2]hs4))=((abs ` hs5)[√ó](hs3 ` hs4)))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ran(hs1),(hs3 `(hs4[hs1]hs5))[‚â§]((hs3 ` hs4)[+](hs3 ` hs5)))))))))}, { < hs0, hs3 > |(hs0 ‚àà CVecOLD ‚àß hs3 ‚àà ùïå)})
  ssopab2i(hs0, hs3, ‚àÉ(hs1, ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ‚àß(< hs1, hs2 > ‚àà CVecOLD ‚àß(hs3 : ran(hs1)‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà ran(hs1),(((hs3 ` hs4)= 0 ‚Üí hs4 =(GId ` hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(hs3 `(hs5[hs2]hs4))=((abs ` hs5)[√ó](hs3 ` hs4)))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ran(hs1),(hs3 `(hs4[hs1]hs5))[‚â§]((hs3 ` hs4)[+](hs3 ` hs5))))))))), (hs0 ‚àà CVecOLD ‚àß hs3 ‚àà ùïå))
  jctir(‚àÉ(hs1, ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ‚àß(< hs1, hs2 > ‚àà CVecOLD ‚àß(hs3 : ran(hs1)‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà ran(hs1),(((hs3 ` hs4)= 0 ‚Üí hs4 =(GId ` hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(hs3 `(hs5[hs2]hs4))=((abs ` hs5)[√ó](hs3 ` hs4)))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ran(hs1),(hs3 `(hs4[hs1]hs5))[‚â§]((hs3 ` hs4)[+](hs3 ` hs5))))))))), hs0 ‚àà CVecOLD, hs3 ‚àà ùïå)
  exlimivv(hs1, hs2, (hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ‚àß(< hs1, hs2 > ‚àà CVecOLD ‚àß(hs3 : ran(hs1)‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà ran(hs1),(((hs3 ` hs4)= 0 ‚Üí hs4 =(GId ` hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(hs3 `(hs5[hs2]hs4))=((abs ` hs5)[√ó](hs3 ` hs4)))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ran(hs1),(hs3 `(hs4[hs1]hs5))[‚â§]((hs3 ` hs4)[+](hs3 ` hs5))))))), hs0 ‚àà CVecOLD)
  3ad2antr1(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >, < hs1, hs2 > ‚àà CVecOLD, (hs3 : ran(hs1)‚Üí ‚Ñù), ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà ran(hs1),(((hs3 ` hs4)= 0 ‚Üí hs4 =(GId ` hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(hs3 `(hs5[hs2]hs4))=((abs ` hs5)[√ó](hs3 ` hs4)))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ran(hs1),(hs3 `(hs4[hs1]hs5))[‚â§]((hs3 ` hs4)[+](hs3 ` hs5))))), hs0 ‚àà CVecOLD)
  biimpar(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >, < hs1, hs2 > ‚àà CVecOLD, hs0 ‚àà CVecOLD)
  eleq1(hs0, < hs1, hs2 >, cvc)
  vex(hs3)
  eqtri(cnv, { < hs0, hs3 > | ‚àÉ(hs1, ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ‚àß(< hs1, hs2 > ‚àà CVecOLD ‚àß(hs3 : ran(hs1)‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà ran(hs1),(((hs3 ` hs4)= 0 ‚Üí hs4 =(GId ` hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(hs3 `(hs5[hs2]hs4))=((abs ` hs5)[√ó](hs3 ` hs4)))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ran(hs1),(hs3 `(hs4[hs1]hs5))[‚â§]((hs3 ` hs4)[+](hs3 ` hs5)))))))))}, { < < hs1, hs2 >, hs3 > |(< hs1, hs2 > ‚àà CVecOLD ‚àß(hs3 : ran(hs1)‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà ran(hs1),(((hs3 ` hs4)= 0 ‚Üí hs4 =(GId ` hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(hs3 `(hs5[hs2]hs4))=((abs ` hs5)[√ó](hs3 ` hs4)))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ran(hs1),(hs3 `(hs4[hs1]hs5))[‚â§]((hs3 ` hs4)[+](hs3 ` hs5))))))})
  df-nv(hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4, hs5)
  dfoprab2(hs1, hs2, hs3, hs0, (< hs1, hs2 > ‚àà CVecOLD ‚àß(hs3 : ran(hs1)‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà ran(hs1),(((hs3 ` hs4)= 0 ‚Üí hs4 =(GId ` hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(hs3 `(hs5[hs2]hs4))=((abs ` hs5)[√ó](hs3 ` hs4)))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ran(hs1),(hs3 `(hs4[hs1]hs5))[‚â§]((hs3 ` hs4)[+](hs3 ` hs5)))))))
  df-xp(hs0, hs3, cvc, universe)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ‚àà CVecOLD)
  diff.hs2.w(hs0 ‚àà CVecOLD)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)

  diff.hs1.s(hs4)

  diff.hs2.s(hs3)

  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.w((< hs1, hs2 > ‚àà CVecOLD ‚àß(hs3 : ran(hs1)‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà ran(hs1),(((hs3 ` hs4)= 0 ‚Üí hs4 =(GId ` hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(hs3 `(hs5[hs2]hs4))=((abs ` hs5)[√ó](hs3 ` hs4)))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà ran(hs1),(hs3 `(hs4[hs1]hs5))[‚â§]((hs3 ` hs4)[+](hs3 ` hs5)))))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.c(cvc)
  diff.hs3.c(cvc)

blocks.name: nvvcop
blocks.content: A normed complex vector space is a vector space. (Contributed by NM, 5-Jun-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-va
blocks.content: Define vector addition on a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-ba
blocks.content: Define the base set of a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-sm
blocks.content: Define scalar multiplication on a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-0v
blocks.content: Define the zero vector in a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-vs
blocks.content: Define vector subtraction on a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-nmcv
blocks.content: Define the norm function in a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 25-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-ims
blocks.content: Define the induced metric on a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nvrel
blocks.content: The class of all normed complex vectors spaces is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: vafval
blocks.content: Value of the function for the vector addition (group) operation on a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm vafval(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cpv, c1))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c1)), cfv(cpv, c1))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cpv, c1), cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c1))), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl5eq(cfv(cpv, c1), cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c1)), cfv(ccom(c1st, c1st), c1), wcel(c1, universe))
  fveq1i(cpv, c1, ccom(c1st, c1st))
  df-va()
  mpan(wcel(c1, universe), wceq(cfv(ccom(c1st, c1st), c1), cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c1))), wf(c1st, universe, universe))
  ax-mp(wf(c1st, universe, universe), wfo(c1st, universe, universe))
  fo1st()
  fof(c1st, universe, universe)
  fvco3(c1st, universe, universe, c1, c1st)
  eqtrd(cfv(cpv, c1), cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c1)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, cpv)
  syl6req(emptycls, cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c1)), cfv(c1st, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))

  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wb(wcel(cop(cop(c0, c1), c2), cnv), w3a(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cvc), wf(c2, c3, cr), wral(s0, c3, w3a(wi(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), c4)), wral(s1, cc, wceq(cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))), co(cfv(cabs, cv(s1)), cmul, cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wral(s1, c3, wbr(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), cle, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c2, cv(s1)))))))))), diffsc(s0, c3))

  ‚ä£ c3 = ran(c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(GId ` c0)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)

blocks.name: nvex
blocks.content: The components of a normed complex vector space are sets. (Contributed by NM, 5-Jun-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  3anbi3d(c0 ‚àà NrmCVec, < c1, c2 > ‚àà CVecOLD, (c3 : c4 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(((c3 ` s0)= 0 ‚Üí s0 = c5)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(c3 `(s1[c2]s0))=((abs ` s1)[√ó](c3 ` s0)))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c4,(c3 `(s0[c1]s1))[‚â§]((c3 ` s0)[+](c3 ` s1))))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(((c3 ` s0)= 0 ‚Üí s0 =(GId ` c1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(c3 `(s1[c2]s0))=((abs ` s1)[√ó](c3 ` s0)))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c4,(c3 `(s0[c1]s1))[‚â§]((c3 ` s0)[+](c3 ` s1))))))
  ralbidv(s0, c4, c0 ‚àà NrmCVec, (((c3 ` s0)= 0 ‚Üí s0 = c5)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(c3 `(s1[c2]s0))=((abs ` s1)[√ó](c3 ` s0)))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c4,(c3 `(s0[c1]s1))[‚â§]((c3 ` s0)[+](c3 ` s1)))), (((c3 ` s0)= 0 ‚Üí s0 =(GId ` c1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(c3 `(s1[c2]s0))=((abs ` s1)[√ó](c3 ` s0)))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c4,(c3 `(s0[c1]s1))[‚â§]((c3 ` s0)[+](c3 ` s1)))))

  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), w3a(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, c4))), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), c5, c3), co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c2, c5, c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cba, c0))

} = {

blocks.name: nv2
blocks.content: A vector plus itself is two times the vector. (Contributed by NM, 9-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm nv2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), co(nat2, c4, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpv, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cns, c0))
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), co(nat2, c4, c1)), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc))

  eqid(cfv(c1st, c0))
  vc2OLD(cfv(c1st, c0), c1, c2, c3, c4)
  vafval(c3, c0)
  smfval(c4, c0)
  bafval(c2, c3, c0)
}

blocks.name: vsfval
blocks.content: Value of the function for the vector subtraction operation on a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm vsfval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(cgs, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cpv, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cnsb, c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(c0, cfv(cgs, c1), cfv(cnsb, c2), cfv(cgs, cfv(cpv, c2)))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cnsb, c2), cfv(cgs, cfv(cpv, c2))), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl5eq(cfv(cnsb, c2), cfv(cgs, cfv(cpv, c2)), cfv(ccom(cgs, cpv), c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  fveq1i(cnsb, c2, ccom(cgs, cpv))
  df-vs()
  mpan(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(ccom(cgs, cpv), c2), cfv(cgs, cfv(cpv, c2))), wf(cpv, universe, universe))
  mpbir(wf(cpv, universe, universe), wf(ccom(c1st, c1st), universe, universe))
  mp2an(wf(ccom(c1st, c1st), universe, universe), wf(c1st, universe, universe), wf(c1st, universe, universe))
  ax-mp(wf(c1st, universe, universe), wfo(c1st, universe, universe))
  fo1st()
  fof(c1st, universe, universe)
  fco(c1st, universe, universe, c1st, universe)
  feq1i(cpv, universe, universe, ccom(c1st, c1st))
  df-va()
  fvco3(cpv, universe, universe, c2, cgs)
  3eqtr4rd(cfv(cnsb, c2), cfv(cgs, cfv(cpv, c2)), cfv(cgs, emptycls), emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  mp1i(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), wceq(cfv(cgs, emptycls), emptycls), wn(wcel(emptycls, cdm(cgs))))
  mtbir(wcel(emptycls, cdm(cgs)), wcel(emptycls, cgr))
  0ngrp()
  eleq2i(emptycls, cdm(cgs), cgr)
  dmmpti(hs0, cgs, cgr, cmpo(hs1, hs2, crn(cv(hs0)), crn(cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cgn, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))))
  mpt2ex(hs1, hs2, crn(cv(hs0)), crn(cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cgn, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2))))
  rnex(cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  df-gdiv(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  ndmfv(emptycls, cgs)
  fveq2d(cgs, cfv(cpv, c2), emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fvprc(c2, cpv)
  fvprc(c2, cnsb)
  fveq2i(cgs, c1, cfv(cpv, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cgr)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(crn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs2.c(crn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm vsfval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(/g ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(+v ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(-v ` c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(c0, (/g ` c1), (-v ` c2), (/g `(+v ` c2)))
  pm2.61i((-v ` c2)=(/g `(+v ` c2)), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq((-v ` c2), (/g `(+v ` c2)), ((/g ‚àò +v)` c2), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fveq1i(cnsb, c2, (/g ‚àò +v))
  df-vs()
  mpan(c2 ‚àà ùïå, ((/g ‚àò +v)` c2)=(/g `(+v ` c2)), (+v : ùïå ‚Üí ùïå))
  mpbir((+v : ùïå ‚Üí ùïå), ((1st ‚àò 1st): ùïå ‚Üí ùïå))
  mp2an(((1st ‚àò 1st): ùïå ‚Üí ùïå), (1st : ùïå ‚Üí ùïå), (1st : ùïå ‚Üí ùïå))
  ax-mp((1st : ùïå ‚Üí ùïå), (1st : ùïå ‚Ü† ùïå))
  fo1st()
  fof(c1st, universe, universe)
  fco(c1st, universe, universe, c1st, universe)
  feq1i(cpv, universe, universe, (1st ‚àò 1st))
  df-va()
  fvco3(cpv, universe, universe, c2, cgs)
  3eqtr4rd((-v ` c2), (/g `(+v ` c2)), (/g ` ‚àÖ), emptycls, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  mp1i(¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå, (/g ` ‚àÖ)= ‚àÖ, ¬¨ ‚àÖ ‚àà dom(/g))
  mtbir(‚àÖ ‚àà dom(/g), ‚àÖ ‚àà GrpOp)
  0ngrp()
  eleq2i(emptycls, dom(/g), cgr)
  dmmpti(hs0, cgs, cgr, (hs1 ‚àà ran(hs0), hs2 ‚àà ran(hs0)‚Ü¶(hs1[hs0]((inv ` hs0)` hs2))))
  mpt2ex(hs1, hs2, ran(hs0), ran(hs0), (hs1[hs0]((inv ` hs0)` hs2)))
  rnex(hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  df-gdiv(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  ndmfv(emptycls, cgs)
  fveq2d(cgs, (+v ` c2), emptycls, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c2, cpv)
  fvprc(c2, cnsb)
  fveq2i(cgs, c1, (+v ` c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cgr)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(ran(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(ran(hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
}

blocks.name: nvzcl
blocks.content: Closure law for the zero vector of a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 27-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nvzcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cn0v, c0))
} = {
  eqeltrd(c1, c2, cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0)), wcel(c0, cnv))
  0vfval(c0, cnv, c1, cfv(cpv, c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0)), c2), wcel(cfv(cpv, c0), cgr))
  nvgrp(c0, cfv(cpv, c0))
  grpoidcl(cfv(cpv, c0), cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0)), c2)
  bafval(c2, cfv(cpv, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cpv, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nvzcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(0vec ` c0)
} = {
  eqeltrd(c1, c2, (GId `(+v ` c0)), c0 ‚àà NrmCVec)
  0vfval(c0, cnv, c1, (+v ` c0))
  syl(c0 ‚àà NrmCVec, (GId `(+v ` c0))‚àà c2, (+v ` c0)‚àà GrpOp)
  nvgrp(c0, (+v ` c0))
  grpoidcl((+v ` c0), (GId `(+v ` c0)), c2)
  bafval(c2, (+v ` c0), c0)
  eqid((+v ` c0))
  eqid((GId `(+v ` c0)))
}

blocks.name: nv0rid
blocks.content: The zero vector is a right identity element. (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nv0rid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c4), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpv, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cn0v, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c1, c3, c4), c1, co(c1, c3, cfv(cgi, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, c3, c4), co(c1, c3, cfv(cgi, c3))))
  oveq2d(c1, c3, c4, cfv(cgi, c3), wcel(c0, cnv))
  0vfval(c0, cnv, c4, c3)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, c3, cfv(cgi, c3)), c1), wcel(c3, cgr))
  nvgrp(c0, c3)
  grporid(c3, c1, c2, cfv(cgi, c3))
  bafval(c2, c3, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cgi, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nv0rid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1[c3]c4)= c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(+v ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0vec ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c1[c3]c4), c1, (c1[c3](GId ` c3)), (c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà NrmCVec, c1 ‚àà c2, (c1[c3]c4)=(c1[c3](GId ` c3)))
  oveq2d(c1, c3, c4, (GId ` c3), c0 ‚àà NrmCVec)
  0vfval(c0, cnv, c4, c3)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà NrmCVec, c1 ‚àà c2, (c1[c3](GId ` c3))= c1, c3 ‚àà GrpOp)
  nvgrp(c0, c3)
  grporid(c3, c1, c2, (GId ` c3))
  bafval(c2, c3, c0)
  eqid((GId ` c3))
}

blocks.name: nv0lid
blocks.content: The zero vector is a left identity element. (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  oveq1d(c3, c4, c1, cfv(cgi, c4), wcel(c0, cnv))
  0vfval(c0, cnv, c3, c4)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(cfv(cgi, c4), c4, c1), c1), wcel(c4, cgr))

  grpolid(c4, c1, c2, cfv(cgi, c4))

blocks.pretty:
thm nv0lid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c3[c4]c1)= c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)

} = {

  0vfval(c0, cnv, c3, c4)

  nvgrp(c0, c4)
  grpolid(c4, c1, c2, (GId ` c4))

blocks.name: nv0
blocks.content: Zero times a vector is the zero vector. (Contributed by NM, 27-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nv0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat0, c3, c1), c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cns, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cn0v, c0))
} = {
  eqtr4d(co(nat0, c3, c1), c4, cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(nat0, c3, c1), cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0))), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc))
  nvvc(c0, cfv(c1st, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c1st, c0))
  vc0(cfv(c1st, c0), c1, c2, c3, cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0)), cfv(cpv, c0))
  vafval(cfv(cpv, c0), c0)
  smfval(c3, c0)
  bafval(c2, cfv(cpv, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c4, cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0))))
  0vfval(c0, cnv, c4, cfv(cpv, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cpv, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nv0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(0[c3]c1)= c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(.sOLD ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0vec ` c0)
} = {
  eqtr4d((0[c3]c1), c4, (GId `(+v ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà NrmCVec, c1 ‚àà c2, (0[c3]c1)=(GId `(+v ` c0)), (1st ` c0)‚àà CVecOLD)
  nvvc(c0, (1st ` c0))
  eqid((1st ` c0))
  vc0((1st ` c0), c1, c2, c3, (GId `(+v ` c0)), (+v ` c0))
  vafval((+v ` c0), c0)
  smfval(c3, c0)
  bafval(c2, (+v ` c0), c0)
  eqid((GId `(+v ` c0)))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà NrmCVec, c1 ‚àà c2, c4 =(GId `(+v ` c0)))
  0vfval(c0, cnv, c4, (+v ` c0))
  eqid((+v ` c0))
}

blocks.name: nvsz
blocks.content: Anything times the zero vector is the zero vector. (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nvsz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c1, c2, c3), c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cns, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cn0v, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(c1, c2, c3), c3, co(c1, c2, cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0))), cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cc)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(c1, c2, cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0))), cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0))), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc))
  nvvc(c0, cfv(c1st, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c1st, c0))
  vcz(cfv(c1st, c0), c1, c2, cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0)), cfv(cpv, c0), cfv(cba, c0))
  vafval(cfv(cpv, c0), c0)
  smfval(c2, c0)
  bafval(cfv(cba, c0), cfv(cpv, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cba, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0)))
  oveq2d(c1, c2, c3, cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cc)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(c3, cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0))))
  0vfval(c0, cnv, c3, cfv(cpv, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cpv, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nvsz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)‚Üí(c1[c2]c3)= c3)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(.sOLD ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0vec ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d((c1[c2]c3), c3, (c1[c2](GId `(+v ` c0))), (GId `(+v ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà NrmCVec, c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (c1[c2](GId `(+v ` c0)))=(GId `(+v ` c0)), (1st ` c0)‚àà CVecOLD)
  nvvc(c0, (1st ` c0))
  eqid((1st ` c0))
  vcz((1st ` c0), c1, c2, (GId `(+v ` c0)), (+v ` c0), (BaseSet ` c0))
  vafval((+v ` c0), c0)
  smfval(c2, c0)
  bafval((BaseSet ` c0), (+v ` c0), c0)
  eqid((BaseSet ` c0))

  oveq2d(c1, c2, c3, (GId `(+v ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà NrmCVec, c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, c3 =(GId `(+v ` c0)))

blocks.name: nvinv
blocks.content: Minus 1 times a vector is the underlying group's inverse element. Equation 2 of [Kreyszig] p. 51. (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nvinv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), c3, c1), cfv(c4, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpv, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cns, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cgn, c5))
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), c3, c1), cfv(c4, c1)), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc))
  nvvc(c0, cfv(c1st, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c1st, c0))
  vcm(cfv(c1st, c0), c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  vafval(c5, c0)
  smfval(c3, c0)
  bafval(c2, c5, c0)
}

} = {

  nvvc(c0, (1st ` c0))
  eqid((1st ` c0))
  vcm((1st ` c0), c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  vafval(c5, c0)
  smfval(c3, c0)

  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cba, c0))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(cneg(nat1), c3, cv(hs0))), wfn(c3, cxp(cc, cfv(cba, c0))), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))

  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cgn, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cba, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cnv))
}

  adantr(c0 ‚àà NrmCVec, hs0 ‚àà(BaseSet ` c0), c3[Fn](‚ÑÇ √ó(BaseSet ` c0)))

  curry1val(c3, cc, (BaseSet ` c0), -u(1), c1, hs0)

  oveq2d(c1, c5, co(cneg(nat1), c6, c3), cfv(cfv(cgn, c5), c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), c6, c3), cfv(cfv(cgn, c5), c3)))

  vsfval(c1, c3, c0)
  mpt2eq3dva(s0, s1, c2, c2, co(cv(s0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c4, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c3, cfv(cfv(cgn, c3), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, cnv))
  oveq2d(cv(s0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c4, cv(s1)), cfv(cfv(cgn, c3), cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))

thm nvrinv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpv, c0))

  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cn0v, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(c1, c3, co(cneg(nat1), c4, c1)), c5, co(c1, c3, cfv(cfv(cgn, c3), c1)), cfv(cgi, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, c3, cfv(cfv(cgn, c3), c1)), cfv(cgi, c3)), wcel(c3, cgr))
  nvgrp(c0, c3)
  grporinv(c3, c1, c2, cfv(cgn, c3), cfv(cgi, c3))
  bafval(c2, c3, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cgi, c3))
  oveq2d(c1, c3, co(cneg(nat1), c4, c1), cfv(cfv(cgn, c3), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)))
  nvinv(c0, c1, c2, c4, cfv(cgn, c3), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cgn, c3))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c5, cfv(cgi, c3)))
  0vfval(c0, cnv, c5, c3)
}

thm nvpncan2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, c4, c3), c5, c1), c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cpv, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cnsb, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, c4, c3), c5, c1), c3, co(co(c1, c4, c3), c4, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, c4, c3), c5, c1), co(co(c1, c4, c3), c4, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c1))), wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  nvgcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)

blocks.name: nvz0
blocks.content: The norm of a zero vector is zero. (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm nvz0(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), nat0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cn0v, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(cfv(c1, c2), nat0, cfv(c1, co(nat0, cfv(cns, c0), c2)), co(nat0, cmul, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cnv))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cnv), wceq(cfv(c1, co(nat0, cfv(cns, c0), c2)), co(nat0, cmul, cfv(c1, c2))), wcel(c2, cfv(cba, c0)))
  mp3an2(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c2, cfv(cba, c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, co(nat0, cfv(cns, c0), c2)), co(nat0, cmul, cfv(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(nat0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, nat0)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(nat0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, nat0))
  0re()
  0le0()
  nvsge0(c0, nat0, c2, cfv(cba, c0), c1, cfv(cns, c0))
  fveq2d(c1, co(nat0, cfv(cns, c0), c2), c2, wcel(c0, cnv))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cnv), wceq(co(nat0, cfv(cns, c0), c2), c2), wcel(c2, cfv(cba, c0)))
  nv0(c0, c2, cfv(cba, c0), cfv(cns, c0), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cns, c0))
  mul02d(cfv(c1, c2), wcel(c0, cnv))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), cc), wcel(c2, cfv(cba, c0)))
  nvzcl(c0, c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  recnd(cfv(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c2, cfv(cba, c0))))
  nvcl(c0, c2, cfv(cba, c0), c1)

blocks.name: nvz
blocks.content: The norm of a vector is zero iff the vector is zero. First part of Problem 2 of [Kreyszig] p. 64. (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm nvz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(cfv(c3, c1), nat0), wceq(c1, c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cn0v, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), nat0), wceq(c1, c4))
  imp(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wi(wceq(cfv(c3, c1), nat0), wceq(c1, c4)))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cnv), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wi(wceq(cfv(c3, c1), nat0), wceq(c1, c4))), wral(hs0, c2, w3a(wi(wceq(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)), wral(hs1, cc, wceq(cfv(c3, co(cv(hs1), cfv(cns, c0), cv(hs0))), co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cmul, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))))), wral(hs1, c2, wbr(cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cpv, c0), cv(hs1))), cle, co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), caddc, cfv(c3, cv(hs1))))))), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wceq(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))
  simp3d(wcel(c0, cnv), wral(hs0, c2, w3a(wi(wceq(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)), wral(hs1, cc, wceq(cfv(c3, co(cv(hs1), cfv(cns, c0), cv(hs0))), co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cmul, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))))), wral(hs1, c2, wbr(cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cpv, c0), cv(hs1))), cle, co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), caddc, cfv(c3, cv(hs1))))))), wcel(cop(cfv(cpv, c0), cfv(cns, c0)), cvc), wf(c3, c2, cr))
  nvi(hs0, hs1, c0, cfv(cpv, c0), cfv(cns, c0), c3, c2, c4)

thm nvmtri(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

blocks.name: nvge0
blocks.content: The norm of a normed complex vector space is nonnegative. Second part of Problem 2 of [Kreyszig] p. 64. (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2006.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Jul-2022.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nvge0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c3, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
} = {
  prodge0rd(cfv(c3, c1), nat2, wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(nat2, crp))

  breqtrd(nat0, cle, co(nat2, cmul, cfv(c3, c1)), co(cfv(c3, c1), caddc, cfv(c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)))

  adantr(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(cn0v, c0)), nat0))
  nvz0(c0, c3, cfv(cn0v, c0))
  fveq2d(c3, cfv(cn0v, c0), co(c1, cfv(cpv, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3eqtrd(cfv(cn0v, c0), co(c1, cfv(cpv, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c1)), co(co(nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1)), cfv(cns, c0), c1), co(co(nat1, cfv(cns, c0), c1), cfv(cpv, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syl5req(cfv(cn0v, c0), co(co(nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1)), cfv(cns, c0), c1), co(nat0, cfv(cns, c0), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)))
  oveq1i(co(nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1)), cfv(cns, c0), c1, nat0)
  1pneg1e0()
  nv0(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cns, c0), cfv(cn0v, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cn0v, c0))
  mpanr1(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(co(nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1)), cfv(cns, c0), c1), co(co(nat1, cfv(cns, c0), c1), cfv(cpv, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c1))), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  mp3anr1(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(co(nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1)), cfv(cns, c0), c1), co(co(nat1, cfv(cns, c0), c1), cfv(cpv, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c1))), wcel(nat1, cc))

  nvdir(c0, nat1, cneg(nat1), c1, c2, cfv(cns, c0), cfv(cpv, c0))
  oveq1d(co(nat1, cfv(cns, c0), c1), cfv(cpv, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c1), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)))
  nvsid(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cns, c0))
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(cfv(c3, co(c1, cfv(cpv, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c1))), cle, co(cfv(c3, c1), caddc, cfv(c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c1)))), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c1), c2))
  mp3an2(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c1), c2), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))

  oveq2d(cfv(c3, c1), caddc, cfv(c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), c1)), cfv(c3, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)))

thm nvge0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí 0[‚â§](c3 ` c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(normCV ` c0)
} = {
  prodge0rd((c3 ` c1), nat2, (c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), 2 ‚àà ‚Ñù+)
  2rp()
  breqtrd(nat0, cle, (2[√ó](c3 ` c1)), ((c3 ` c1)[+](c3 `(-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1))), (c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  eqbrtrd(nat0, cle, ((c3 ` c1)[+](c3 `(-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1))), (c3 `(c1[(+v ` c0)](-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1))), (c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  eqtr3d(nat0, (c3 `(c1[(+v ` c0)](-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1))), (c3 `(0vec ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà NrmCVec, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 `(0vec ` c0))= 0)
  nvz0(c0, c3, (0vec ` c0))
  fveq2d(c3, (0vec ` c0), (c1[(+v ` c0)](-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1)), (c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  3eqtrd((0vec ` c0), (c1[(+v ` c0)](-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1)), ((1[+]-u(1))[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1), ((1[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1)[(+v ` c0)](-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1)), (c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  syl5req((0vec ` c0), ((1[+]-u(1))[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1), (0[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1), (c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  oveq1i((1[+]-u(1)), (.sOLD ` c0), c1, nat0)
  1pneg1e0()
  nv0(c0, c1, c2, (.sOLD ` c0), (0vec ` c0))
  eqid((0vec ` c0))
  mpanr1(c0 ‚àà NrmCVec, c1 ‚àà c2, ((1[+]-u(1))[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1)=((1[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1)[(+v ` c0)](-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1)), -u(1)‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  mp3anr1(c0 ‚àà NrmCVec, -u(1)‚àà ‚ÑÇ, c1 ‚àà c2, ((1[+]-u(1))[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1)=((1[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1)[(+v ` c0)](-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1)), 1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  ax-1cn()
  nvdir(c0, nat1, -u(1), c1, c2, (.sOLD ` c0), (+v ` c0))
  oveq1d((1[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1), (+v ` c0), (-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1), c1, (c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  nvsid(c0, c1, c2, (.sOLD ` c0))
  mpd3an3(c0 ‚àà NrmCVec, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 `(c1[(+v ` c0)](-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1)))[‚â§]((c3 ` c1)[+](c3 `(-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1))), (-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1)‚àà c2)
  mp3an2(c0 ‚àà NrmCVec, c1 ‚àà c2, (-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1)‚àà c2, -u(1)‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  neg1cn()
  nvscl(c0, -u(1), c1, c2, (.sOLD ` c0))
  nvtri(c0, c1, c2, (-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1), c3, (+v ` c0))
  eqid((+v ` c0))
  eqtr4d(((c3 ` c1)[+](c3 `(-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1))), (2[√ó](c3 ` c1)), ((c3 ` c1)[+](c3 ` c1)), (c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  oveq2d((c3 ` c1), caddc, (c3 `(-u(1)[(.sOLD ` c0)]c1)), (c3 ` c1), (c0 ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))

blocks.name: nvgt0
blocks.content: A nonzero norm is positive. (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nvgt0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wne(c1, c3), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(c4, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cn0v, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
} = {
  bitr3d(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wne(c1, c3), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(c4, c1)), wne(cfv(c4, c1), nat0))

  3adant3(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), cr))

blocks.name: nvop

thm nvop(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wceq(c0, cop(cop(c1, c2), c3)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cpv, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cns, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(c0, cop(cop(c1, c2), c3), cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wcel(c0, cnv))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cnv), wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wrel(cnv))
  nvrel()
  1st2nd(cnv, c0)
  syl5eqr(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), cop(cop(c1, c2), c3), cop(cfv(c1st, c0), c3), wcel(c0, cnv))
  opeq2i(cfv(c1st, c0), c3, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  nmcvfval(c3, c0)
  opeq1d(cfv(c1st, c0), c3, cop(c1, c2), wcel(c0, cnv))
  nvvop(c0, cfv(c1st, c0), c1, c2)
  eqid(cfv(c1st, c0))
}
